content: On a somewhat related note but more on the mobile side: can we just display the time for every message? I'd take having the name/avatar being redundantly displayed for contiguous messages if that's the only way to get timestamps displayed consistently.
A message was moved here from #design > Timestamp position by Greg Price.

I agree it'd be good to make it easier to see the time for each message. We actually added a feature a few years ago that makes it available â€” #M3491. If you tap on a message, you'll see the time for it. But I think that hasn't been super discoverable.
Around the same time, we experimented with a design where the time would be shown for every message. Design discussion in this thread from when that design was deployed in beta.
